Class PathBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.iss.mv2.io.PathBuilder

  • public class PathBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class to build file paths.
    Author:
    Marcel Singer

    • Constructor Detail

      • PathBuilder

        public PathBuilder(java.io.File someFile)
            throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                   java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Creates a new PathBuilder from the specified location.
        Parameters:
        someFile - A file providing the current location in the file system. The given instance can be either a directory or a file.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Is thrown if the given file does not exist.
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if the given file is null.

    • Method Detail

      • getChildFilePath

        public java.lang.String getChildFilePath(java.lang.String fileName)
                                  throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Builds the path for a file located under the current directory.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file (including the extension). The name may or may not start with the file path separator.
        Returns:
        The absolute file path to the requested file.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if the given file name is null or empty.

      • getChildFile

        public java.io.File getChildFile(java.lang.String fileName)
                          throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Builds the path for a file located under the current directory.
        Parameters:
        fileName - The name of the file (including the extension). The name may or may not start with the file path separator.
        Returns:
        The file object created from the requested file path.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - Is thrown if the given file name is null or empty.
